statements: SELECT * FROM grants
SELECT amount, organization_name FROM grants
SELECT organization_name, grant_date FROM grants WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT grant_date, amount FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC
SELECT organization_name, amount FROM grants ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT organization_name, amount FROM grants WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Company'
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND organization_name LIKE 'XYZ%' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM grants
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_date FROM grants ORDER BY organization_name, grant_date
SELECT * FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE organization_name='ABC Foundation';
SELECT org_name, org_location FROM organizations WHERE org_type='Nonprofit' ORDER BY org_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT org_name, org_contact_person FROM organizations WHERE org_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, SUM(grant_amount) FROM grants GROUP BY organization_name HAVING SUM(grant_amount) > 50000;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants WHERE organization_name LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY grant_amount DESC, grant_date ASC;

SELECT org_name, org_location, COUNT(grant_id) AS total_grants FROM organizations LEFT JOIN grants ON organizations.org_id = grants.organization_id GROUP BY org_name, org_location ORDER BY total_grants DESC;
SELECT org_name, org_type, org_contact_person FROM organizations WHERE org_location = 'New York' AND org_type = 'Non-Profit' ORDER BY org_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT organization_name, grant_amount FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipients WHERE recipient_type='Individual';
SELECT recipient_name, organization_id FROM recipients WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, report_text FROM reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT organization_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipients WHERE recipient_type = 'Nonprofit';
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT grant_id, nonprofits.nonprofit_name, grant_date FROM grants JOIN nonprofits ON grants.nonprofit_id = nonprofits.nonprofit_id;

SELECT grant_id, nonprofits.nonprofit_name, grant_amount, grant_date, category_name FROM grants JOIN nonprofits ON grants.nonprofit_id = nonprofits.nonprofit_id JOIN grant_allocations ON grants.grant_id = grant_allocations.grant_id JOIN grant_categories ON grant_allocations.category_id = grant_categories.category_id;
SELECT nonprofit_id, COUNT(grant_id) AS total_grants FROM grants GROUP BY nonprofit_id;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000;
SELECT nonprofit_name, nonprofit_location FROM nonprofits WHERE nonprofit_type = 'Education';
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT grants.grant_id, nonprofits.nonprofit_name, grant_amount FROM grants JOIN nonprofits ON grants.nonprofit_id = nonprofits.nonprofit_id;
SELECT grant_id, category_name, allocation_amount FROM grant_categories JOIN grant_allocations ON grant_categories.category_id = grant_allocations.category_id WHERE allocation_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT organization_name, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM nonprofit_organizations WHERE organization_type = 'Non-profit';
SELECT grantor_name, contact_email FROM grantors WHERE grantor_type = 'Company';
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_amount, grant_date FROM grants ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_id, organization_name, grant_date, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE organization_name='XYZ Foundation';
SELECT grantor_name, grantor_type, contact_email FROM grantors WHERE grantor_type='Individual' ORDER BY grantor_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM grant_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Education%';

SELECT g.grant_id, n.organization_name, gc.category_name FROM grants g JOIN nonprofit_organizations n ON g.organization_name = n.organization_name JOIN grant_categories gc ON g.category_id = gc.category_id WHERE g.grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY g.grant_id DESC;
